channel.title: Help w/ webclient - 317
channel.description:
Hi, basically I'm getting an error when I try to create my webclient, the error is:
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/209cc81f11a8a29f6678e1400bdff599.png[/img]
The html code is this:
[QUOTE]<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>server name</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="TzhaarPK" width="100%" height="100%" archive="*" code="Client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY>[/QUOTE]
The console error I get is [QUOTE] CacheEntry[*]: updateAvailable=false,lastModified=Thu Jan 01 01:00:00 GMT 1970,length=-1 [/QUOTE]
If you would like to see for yourself then the webclient is:*

item.title: Help w/ webclient - 317
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Replace

with

Make sure your jar is placed in the public folder on dropbox. If you don’t have a public folder click here to re-enable it https://www.dropbox.com/enable_public_folder

Read full topic

item.title: Help w/ webclient - 317
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Unfortunately, you’re not able to post the link directing others to your webclient publicly. I’ve removed the link and inserted an asterisk in its place.

Read full topic

item.title: Help w/ webclient - 317
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“mageabcss, post:3, topic:543038”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=661915.msg4424216#msg4424216 date=1399952532]
You’re really going to hate yourself…
Change:
code="Client.class"
to
code=“client.class”
[/quote]

I’ve tried that already[/quote]

Is your client signed?
The only thing I can think of besides that is you made the jar incorrectly.

Edit: I signed your client and it’s working… Go use a tool like JARMaker and sign the client.
here’s the applet code I used:

<applet title="TzhaarPk%20317" code="client.class" archive="TzhaarPK%20317.jar" width="765" height="503">
</applet>

Read full topic
